body_html:
Very nice! I am still reading (sorry for the delay) so more to come :)

One immediate observation I have is I don't quite understand the meaning of "plugin" in this context. It seems me a more fitting place would be a executor/ backend similar to CPU/GPU, under service/ directory, but I will defer the final say to eliben@.
